notes.architecture: Nelson Muntz uses an external bash loop that spawns fresh Claude sessions. Unlike Ralph Wiggum v1 which used stop-hooks to intercept exit, Nelson Muntz relies on the bash script (nelson-muntz.sh) to orchestrate iterations.
notes.why_minimal_hooks: The main loop logic is in scripts/nelson-muntz.sh, not in hooks. Hooks here are optional notifications for visibility into loop progress.
